title: JonnyDrama
author: JonnyDrama
content: Hello everyone,I'm a part of a dex project which just launched recently, I'm facing some issues with the marketing,Unfortunately, we have a low budget which makes it hard to run PPC campaigns.What would you suggest doing, I have that feeling that I can do better but I'm stuck.

comments.author: raumonds
comments.body: Have you tried leveraging social media platforms to your advantage? It's free and has a wide reach, so maybe you can try running giveaways or contests to attract attention to your project. If you're low on funds, you might want to consider partnering with influencers or other projects in the crypto space to help spread the word. They can help amplify your message and reach a wider audience. And don't underestimate the power of good old-fashioned PR - reach out to crypto publications and offer to do an interview or share your story. Good luck with your marketing efforts!

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Make an announcement thread here and be active on that thread giving updates on what's happening with the development of that dex project. Quote from: raumonds on April 13, 2023, 05:14:42 AMHave you tried leveraging social media platforms to your advantage? It's free and has a wide reach, so maybe you can try running giveaways or contests to attract attention to your project. This is the first one that you should do aside from making an ann thread. Your social media presence is important and that's going to make you look conversational if you're engaging with the followers you have. So, you get to have an online presence from the forum as well as on social media. Since you've said that you're in low budget for marketing, it will take time until you build that organic followers and engagement of yours.

comments.author: inanilujimi
comments.body: My suggestion is to try to make a dex whose blockchain is currently hype like Arb. use social media to reach a large number of people by continuously promoting it, however dex it must have sufficient funds for strong liquidity, good luck to you.
